item.title: f8 fc
item.description: The open-source brushed AIO flight controller for x8 drones. f8 fc is a fully open source flight controller that is made primarily for small drones with brushed drones. It features: STM32F405 microcontroller with 1MB flash BMI270 imu BMP388 barometer Onboard 16MB external flash for data logging Status LEDs 1-4s input voltage 4 available UARTs 8 brushed motor drives with 6A mosfets Voltage & current sensing

item.title: The worlds smallest x8 drone with brushed motors
